subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Carolina entered the season without a proven No. 1 wide receiver, but Ted Ginn Jr., Jerricho Cotchery and others have helped Cam Newton reach a career high in touchdown passes.
snippet: Carolina entered the season without a proven No. 1 wide receiver, but Ted Ginn Jr., Jerricho Cotchery and others have helped Cam Newton reach a career high in touchdown passes.
